Trade/Device Name(s): OSOM ULTRA PLUS FLU A&B Test
OSOM® ULTRA PLUS FLU A&B Test
Regulation Name(s): Influenza virus antigen detection test system
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): OSOM ULTRA PLUS FLU A&B Test stick
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for OSOM ULTRA PLUS FLU A&B rapid immunochromatographic assay for qualitative detection of influenza A and B antigens in nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative rapid detection of influenza A and B nucleoprotein antigens from nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs of patients with respiratory infection symptoms to aid differential diagnosis; not intended for detection of influenza C.
